title: South Korea at the Asian Games
text:
<a href="Republic%20of%20Korea">Republic of Korea</a> has competed at every celebration of the <a href="Asian%20Games">Asian Games</a> except the <a href="1951%20Asian%20Games">1951 Asian Games</a>, including hosting the Summer Games in <a href="1986%20Asian%20Games">1986</a>, <a href="2002%20Asian%20Games">2002</a>, and <a href="2014%20Asian%20Games">2014</a> and the Winter Games in <a href="1999%20Asian%20Winter%20Games">1999</a>.
South Korean athletes have won a total of 2235 medals at the <a href="Asian%20Games">Asian Games</a> and have won a total of 249 medals at the <a href="Asian%20Winter%20Games">Asian Winter Games</a>, with <a href="Short%20track%20speed%20skating">Short track speed skating</a> and <a href="Speed%20skating">Speed skating</a> as the main medal-producing sports.
